law.catch_line: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated....

text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Aircraft" includes any part of an aircraft.
"Boat" includes any part of a boat.
"Clerk of the court" means the clerk of the circuit court of a county.
"Mobile home" has the meaning stated in § 8A-101(c) of the Real Property Article.

section.section: "Motor vehicle" has the meaning stated in Title 11 of the Transportation Article.
"Motor vehicle" includes any part of a motor vehicle.

text.section: "Park owner" has the meaning stated in § 8A-101(f) of the Real Property Article.
"Property" means any aircraft, boat, mobile home, or motor vehicle.
"Resident" has the meaning stated in § 8A-101(j) of the Real Property Article.
